docs.lead_paragraph: Suga is not the name of an artificial sweetener, but of one of the most attractive new beauty salons in town, and in turn, of its owner, Suga Yuske.

headline.main: Salon That, in Decor and Stylists, Blends East and West; SHOP TALK

docs.abstract: Suga's (S Uske) beauty salon and La Coupe salon, NYC, described; illus
docs.snippet: Suga is not the name of an artificial sweetener, but of one of the most attractive new beauty salons in town, and in turn, of its owner, Suga Yuske.
